entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
